doc.title: Life in the Game
doc.plot: Follow the rise and fall of ' Little Melvin' Williams, heroin Czar for two decades, in his own words. Melvin started out as a professional gambler, gaining the respect of the street but after being framed by a Baltimore Cop, for being a threat and incarcerated, Melvin vowed revenge. He kept his promise and after his release flooded the streets with drugs, raking in 1/2 billion dollars, while eluding the police. Time and an informant finally caught up with Melvin.
